metadata.title: CVE-2018-11775 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: TLS hostname verification when using the Apache ActiveMQ Client before5.15.6 was missing which could make the client vulnerable to a MITM attackbetween a Java application using the ActiveMQ client and the ActiveMQserver. This is now enabled by default.

criterions.comment: activemq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
